modName: Skyrim 5 Year Anniversary Main Menu Replacer
summary: This is my very first mod and after realizing that I have been on the site for years, it was time to create something that I hope will bring some enjoyment!
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]Skyrim 5 Year Anniversary Enhanced Main Menu II 

A Nexus Mods Exclusive[/center][center]
[youtube]DNmU2E5gCcw[/youtube][/center]
"Skyrim will be 5 years old next month and as we all know, Skyrim (PC) is still light years beyond any other game thanks to the genius-level modders at NexusMods Skyrim - This mod is a great enhancement to the game being that it's lore friendly and comes with an amazing audiotrack".


NOTES ABOUT VIDEO:
"This video was captured using nVidia Experience at low settings - Mod quality level shown below"

Mod audio track: 160 kbps.
Texture effects: 1920x1080 
Animation: 60FPS.

This fully animated menu replacer is very simple to install but I do recommend making a backup of the original files that this mod will replace.
After backing up your original files, just copy all the files from this archive within the "Data" folder - All files are inside their respective
branch folders so there is no confusion. 

** There are other similar mods like this but what sets this one apart is that the LOADING SCREENS also contains the fire animation! 

Optional:
I recommend GeeGee's Font Replacer here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40440/?
[left][/left]



Credits:
Audio Track: Malukah  
Track Title: "Frozen Sleep"
Free MP3 & chords: [url=http://www.malukah.com/FREE]http://www.malukah.com/FREE[/url]
Animated Emblem:  Brumbek/Killerhell
Fire Particle Effects: Rheadude/Mindflux
[center][/center]
author: sweetbrown66
